name: Ext_R5_Provenance_encounter
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Provenance.encounter for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Provenance.encounter from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Provenance|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Encounter within which this event occurred or which the event is tightly associated
element.definition: This will typically be the encounter the event occurred, but some events may be initiated prior to or after the official completion of an encounter but still be tied to the context of the encounter (e.g. pre-admission lab tests).
element.comment: `Provenance.encounter` has no related element in R4B:Provenance
